law.catch_line: Before the Department issues a controlled hazardous substance facility permit, the Department shall ...

text.section: Before the Department issues a controlled hazardous substance facility permit, the Department shall comply with Title 1, Subtitle 6 of this article.

Before the Department issues a low-level nuclear waste facility permit, the Department shall:
Comply with Title 1, Subtitle 6 of this article; and
Conduct any public hearing required by § 1-604 of this article in the county where the proposed facility is to be located.
